channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed - August 27, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
The Mexican town putting Sheinbaum’s security crackdown to the test — The Financial Times

State of Chiapas looks to quell armed groups in Pantelhó ahead of delayed election and US pressure over security

Venezuelans turn to crypto as government targets dollars — The Financial Times

As Maduro cracks down on black market dollars and the bolívar plunges, ever more locals see crypto as a bulwark

Mexico’s Cartels Are Exporting Their Bloody Rivalry to Ecuador and Beyond — The Wall Street Journal

The two most powerful drug rings are locked in a turf war over control of a key South American smuggling route. The bodies are piling up.

Health Crisis Spirals in Colombia as ERs and Maternity Wards Close — Bloomberg

Health Crisis Spirals in Colombia as ERs and Maternity Wards Close

Messi’s Favorite Drink Is Rocked After Milei Ends Price Controls — Bloomberg

Messi’s Favorite Drink Is Rocked After Milei Ends Price Controls

Copper May Be the Color of Argentina’s Future — Bloomberg

Copper May Be the Color of Argentina’s Future
